conferenceName: International Conference on Recent Trends in Computing and Communication Technologies (ICRCCT) 2024

organization.department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
organization.college: Sri Sairam College of Engineering, Anekal
organization.venue: Seminar Hall, Sri Sairam College of Engineering, Anekal

conferenceDetails.occurrence: its going to happen for 2 days first day will be of paper presentation and second day will be of pichathon event

paperTopics: These are example topics, but any paper related to Computer Science and Engineering is welcome.

eventActivities.name: Paper Presentations
eventActivities.description: Presenting papers on various topics related to computing and communication technologies.

eventActivities.name: Pitchathon
eventActivities.description: Event for participants to pitch innovative ideas and prototypes.
eventActivities.date: its gonna happen on second day of the conference

general.question: What is the objective of the ICRCCT 2024 conference?
general.answer: The objective of the conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to discuss recent trends and developments in computing and communication technologies.

general.question: Who are the main organizers of the ICRCCT 2024?
general.answer: The main organizers are the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Sri Sairam College of Engineering.

general.question: Where is the ICRCCT 2024 conference being held?
general.answer: The conference will be held at the Seminar Hall, Sri Sairam College of Engineering, Anekal.

general.question: What is the registration process for the conference?
general.answer: Participants can register through the official registration link provided on the conference website.

paperSubmission.question: What are the submission guidelines for papers at ICRCCT 2024?
paperSubmission.answer: Submission guidelines are available on the conference website. All papers should follow the specified format and must be submitted before the deadline.

paperSubmission.question: What topics are acceptable for paper submissions?
paperSubmission.answer: Papers can be submitted on topics including Communication and Networks, Data Science, Advanced Computing, Circuits and Systems, 5G Networks, and more.

paperSubmission.question: When is the last date for paper submission?
paperSubmission.answer: The last date for paper submission is October 18th, 2024.

paperSubmission.question: How will plagiarism be checked for submitted papers?
paperSubmission.answer: All submitted papers will be checked for plagiarism using standard plagiarism detection tools.

paperSubmission.question: how to submit paper
paperSubmission.answer: register for the conference through our website and then you will recieve a mail from our side [enter the login cred and then you can submit the paper]

paperSubmission.question: who can submit the paper?
paperSubmission.answer: only the team leader should submit the paper

pitchathon.question: What is the Pitchathon event?
pitchathon.answer: The Pitchathon is an event where participants can pitch their innovative ideas and prototypes related to technology and engineering.

pitchathon.question: Do participants need a prototype for the Pitchathon?
pitchathon.answer: It is optional, but participants are encouraged to have a working prototype, as it can add value to their pitch.

pitchathon.question: Is the Pitchathon event related to the papers being presented?
pitchathon.answer: The Pitchathon is a separate event, but participants may choose to present ideas related to their paper submissions. its going to happen on second day and you should present a ppt based on your product

importantDates.question: When is the acceptance notification for paper submissions?
importantDates.answer: The acceptance notification will be sent out on October 25th, 2024.

importantDates.question: What is the deadline for registering for the conference?
importantDates.answer: The deadline for registration is October 27th, 2024.

importantDates.question: When is the final date for submitting a soft copy of the paper?
importantDates.answer: The final date for submitting a soft copy of the paper is October 27th, 2024.

miscellaneous.question: How can participants contact the conference organizers?
miscellaneous.answer: Participants can contact the conference organizers via email at icrcct@gmail.com. or 83002-71850/63828-17065

miscellaneous.question: Who should the soft copy of the paper be mailed to?
miscellaneous.answer: The soft copy of the paper should be sent through the website, click the submit button and enter your login credentials there and then submit the paper
